hero.subtitle: Mission
hero.title: Make Every Cancer Recovery 100% Successful
hero.description: We believe cancer recovery shouldn’t be fragmented, improvised, or left to chance. It deserves continuity, structure, and real support beyond treatment.

whyRubyCare.title: Why Ruby Care
whyRubyCare.description: A cancer diagnosis reshapes every part of a person’s life — physical, emotional, social, and professional. Recovery is not a moment. It’s a long phase that unfolds over months and years. What breaks survivorship care today isn’t medical expertise. It’s what happens after treatment, when structure disappears and patients are left without guidance between appointments. Ruby Care exists to make recovery a supported, continuous process — for both specialists and patients.

reality.title: The reality
reality.footer: Survival is improving, but recovery is not. And this adds additional burden on healthcare systems that are already stretched out.

description.primary: Ruby Care is built around a single, shared care structure — a personalized support plan that carries recovery forward over time.
description.secondary: This lowers cognitive load for specialists, restores continuity after treatment, and helps patients feel guided rather than left alone.

team.title: Team
team.subtitle: A small, focused team building the infrastructure for cancer recovery.
team.description: We’re building Ruby in close collaboration with leading experts, including Dr. Markus Knott, and develop the product together with a limited group of oncology specialists. Our goal is to ensure real-world relevance and clinical soundness before scaling it further.

manifest.title: Where Care Meets Craft
manifest.description: A brief declaration of our ambition, responsibility, and how we think about building Ruby.
manifest.intro: We believe the future of healthcare lives at the intersection of real impact and thoughtful product craft.
manifest.craft: We’re not just building software. We’re shaping an experience that carries quality — carefully designed, deeply engineered, and built around what patients and specialists actually need over time.
manifest.quality: In healthcare, quality is often compromised. We don’t accept that. Especially in cancer care, where continuity, clarity, and follow-through matter.
manifest.standard: We believe patients shouldn’t feel left alone once treatment ends. And specialists shouldn’t have to rely on scattered tools, memory, or workarounds to provide ongoing support.
manifest.complexity: Healthcare is complex. Cancer care even more so. That complexity is the work. Our responsibility is to take it on — with care, clarity, and conviction.

howWeHelp.title: How Ruby Enables Truly Personalized Support
howWeHelp.description: A personal video from Lukasz, founder of Ruby.

left.title: Specialists get a shared workspace with a continuous view of the patient.
left.modalDescription: Ruby provides specialists with a shared workspace that brings patient information, follow-ups, and support plans into one continuous view over time. Instead of scattered notes, emails, and memory, everything becomes a single reference that carries forward across the patient journey. AI supports structuring and drafting information, while clinical judgment and decisions always remain with you. This reduces friction before and during appointments and enables longitudinal support without standardizing or prescribing care.

right.title: Patients get a clear structure and guidance they can rely on.
right.modalDescription: Patients receive a personalized support plan that helps them understand what matters next and how to move forward over time. The plan organizes steps and provides a shared reference they can return to whenever needed. Ruby offers a safe, structured space to stay connected with their specialist and benefit from AI support in a transparent, supportive way. Clear structure helps reduce uncertainty and builds confidence throughout recovery.

step5.title: Create a shared reference
step5.description: The support plan becomes a shared reference point for everyone involved.

step6.title: Keep context over time
step6.description: Ruby helps you keep track of progress, symptoms, and patient well-being over time.

structuredIntake.title: Structured Intake
structuredIntake.description: Turn patient onboarding into a structured intake. Ruby gathers and organizes information upfront using natural language, so you start informed, and prepared.

plusMore.title: Plus, a lot more
plusMore.description: All features work together as one shared workspace. Ruby structures information, preserves context over time, and reduces day-to-day coordination overhead.

supportPlan.title: Support Plan
supportPlan.description: Patients generate a clear, easy-to-follow support plan based on their intake data, which they review together with you. You stay in full control of content, adjustments, and clinical decisions at every step.

careMonitoring.description: Recovery continues at home through a patient-facing interface designed for follow-up, progress tracking, and symptom reporting.
